content: what has faux fur a comfy feel a throwback look and a ridiculously easy pattern the faux fur bucket hat of course this hat works up in about an hour which makes it a go-to crochet pattern for holiday gift giving dressing up your winter wardrobe selling at craft fairs etc and best of all it s a 2000s retro look that s become incredibly popular recently you ll be getting all the warm fuzzies literally with this adorable hat this pattern calls for about 100 yds of super bulky faux fur yarn stitches used are the single_crochet it would also be helpful to know how to crochet in the round the overall difficulty level for this pattern is easy+ the pattern is easy but the yarn can be difficult to see for beginners finished measurements are about 23 inches around fits a 21-22 inch head circumference one size fits most for women/teens hat measures 10 inches long when laying flat happy crocheting
